attributes.action: Create an ethical framework for policy.
attributes.additional_details:
This arises from Mr Johnson's speech to the UN 74th General Assembly (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zf4YEyh7erE&ab_channel=UnitedNations).
We now ask for clarification and evidence of due diligence and environmental assessment in the current rapid roll-out of online and especially mobile data technology; the same for tests and possible vaccines for Covid-19; and the safeguards implemented for public health, human rights and civil liberties that he advocated
attributes.background: In September 2019, the Prime Minister spoke of the need for an ethical framework in the roll-out of new technologies.  We agree, and now ask for details of the ethics adopted so far, and of the international conference he proposed to develop them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do in more closely regulating the development and use of artificial intelligence and related technologies.
